testgroup.ptxt: Or detection of a leak in the exhaust gas recirculation valve
Use “Initialize EGR valve data” on SUZUKI scan tool command to try to reinitialise the operating values of the EGR valve.
Switch OFF the ignition and wait 40 seconds.
Switch the ignition back on and check for faults.
If the fault is still present:

item.ptxt: Disconnect the connector of the EGR valve.
Remove the EGR valve referring to EGR Valve Removal and Installation:For F9Q Engine and reconnect it after having removed it.
Check that no particles are blocking the movement of the EGR valve flap.
Check that the EGR valve is not stuck or jammed in one position.

Check the movement of the valve with displaying “EGR position sensor” on Data List of SUZUKI scan tool (0 to 2.5 mm travel for an opening cyclic ratio of 40% and when fully open, ~ 5 mm, for an opening cyclic ratio of 95%).
Check that the EGR valve flap closes completely.

testgroup.question: Is there in good condition?

action.ptxt: Replace the EGR valve referring to EGR Valve Removal and Installation:For F9Q Engine .

testgroup.ptxt: Remove the EGR valve referring to EGR Valve Removal and Installation:For F9Q Engine the EGR valve should not contain a cluster of soot between the base and the valve.
Clean the EGR valve sleeve if necessary.
testgroup.question: Is there in good condition?

action.ptxt: Replace the EGR valve referring to EGR Valve Removal and Installation:For F9Q Engine .

test1.ptxt: Use “Initialize EGR valve data” on SUZUKI scan tool command to try to reinitialise the operating values of the EGR valve.
Check the air circuit referring to Test 3: Checking the turbocharged air inlet circuit:For Diesel Engine Model .
Check the MAF sensor referring to Test 4: MAF sensor:For Diesel Engine Model .

item.ptxt: Leave the engine at idling speed for 1 min.
Accelerate very slowly up to 1500 rpm for 2 mins until the exhaust gas recirculation function becomes active.
Carry out a vehicle test at low speed, without accelerating heavily, then normally.
Check for faults using SUZUKI scan tool.

testgroup.question: Does customer complaint or the faults recur?

action.ptxt: Substitute a known-good ECM and recheck.
